r0      000
r1      001
r2      010
r3      011
r4      100
r5      101
r6      110
r7      111
swap    1110100
add     0010000
iadd    010100000000
sub     0010100
and     0011000
or      0011100
shl     01000
shr     01001
not     0000100000
inc     0001000000
dec     0001100000
out     1000000000
in      1000100000000
nop     0000000000000000
hlt     1111111111111111
ret     1010100000000000
rti     1011000000000000
setc    1111111111111110
clrc    1111111111111101
setn    1111111111111011
clrn    1111111111110111
setz    1111111111101111
clrz    1111111111011111
push    1100000000
pop     1100100000000
ldm     1101000000000
ldd     110110
std     111000
jz      1001000000000
jmp     1001100000000
call    1010000000000
